aboutme: I am a Clinical Pharmacist looking for a career change. Currently studying CyberSecurity in Universidad de San Isidro and Web Development in Argentina Programa. I have also studied Web Development in FreeCodeCamp, and Cybersecurity (Ethical Hacking) through the HackTheBox and TryHackMe platforms. I believe I hold general knowledge in IT, inlcuding: Hardware management, OS booting (Windows & Linux), Network Management, Virtual Machine implementation and also CryptoMining.
